snippet: As hackers break into businesses large and small, entrepreneurs and venture capitalists in Silicon Valley are taking an interest in start-ups that specialize in security, report Nicole Perlroth and Evelyn M. Rusli in Monday's New York Times.
abstract: As hackers break into businesses large and small, entrepreneurs and venture capitalists in Silicon Valley are taking an interest in start-ups that specialize in security, report Nicole Perlroth and Evelyn M. Rusli in Monday's New York Times.

headline.main: Security Start-Ups Catch Fancy of Investors
